subject: Wages and Salaries
Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A.’s free-agent summer of 2010 may have taken a hit with the announcement that the salary cap will decrease next season and possibly further still in 2010-11.
snippet: The N.B.A.’s free-agent summer of 2010 may have taken a hit with the announcement that the salary cap will decrease next season and possibly further still in 2010-11.
